ref: 12767 śvāśurá. 2. sāvro m. ʻ in -- law's house ʼ.

12767 śvāśurá m. ʻ *father -- in -- law's son, i.e. wife's or husband's brother ʼ (P. Thieme ZDMG 106, 153, Turner BSOAS xxiii 106) later replaced by śvaśuryà -- leaving śvāśura -- as ʻ dependent (son, pupil?) of father -- in -- law's grandson (śvāśuri -- ), and later 2. ʻ pertaining to a father -- in -- law ʼ Kathās. [śváśura -- ]
K. hahar m. ʻ wife's brother ʼ;
Si. hūrā ʻ wife's or husband's brother ʼ.
